title: Futura
album: Carousel (An Examination of the Shadow, Creekflow, and its Life as an Afterthought)
lyrics: Maybe it’s something in the way my stomach churns
The feeling that right around the corner
Is a rough and salty sea
Yet I imagine that for you
The stillness of the lake it hides
Is what makes you feel free
Can it all fall in so neatly?
That no flower will be missed?
Spread your wings, don’t look back
To know of a warm summer’s day
The bitter of winter must fray
The rare comfort of quiet won’t depart
